title: Council Decision of 14 July 2014 adopting the Council’s position on draft amending budget No 2 of the European Union for the financial year 2014
header:
17.7.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 227/3
COUNCIL DECISION
of 14 July 2014
adopting the Council’s position on draft amending budget No 2 of the European Union for the financial year 2014
2014/C 227/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 314 thereof, in conjunction with the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 106a thereof,
Having regard to Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 966/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2012 on the financial rules applicable to the general budget of the Union and repealing Council Regulation (EC, Euratom) No 1605/2002 (1) and in particular Article 41 thereof,
Whereas:
main_body:
The Council’s position on draft amending budget No 2 of the European Union for the financial year 2014 was adopted on 14 July 2014.
The full text can be accessed for consultation or downloading on the Council’s website: http://www.consilium.europa.eu/
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 2014.
For the Council
The President
M. MARTINA
(1)  OJ L 298, 26.10.2012, p. 1.
(2)  OJ L 51, 20.2.2014, p. 1, with corrigenda in OJ L 111, 15.4.2014, p. 96 and in OJ L 124, 25.4.2014, p. 30.
